content: Implement TYPE-SYSTEM-6: Add inner_types() and signature() methods to EnumVariantInfo
Run build-check.sh and fix any compilation errors after EnumVariantInfo changes
Add VariantSignature enum and VariantAccess enum types
Run build-check.sh after adding new types and functions
Implement DUPLICATION-2: Replace build_enum_example to call build_all_enum_examples
Implement enum recursion in EnumMutationBuilder::build_paths with TYPE-SYSTEM-5 (use create_field_context)
Run build-check.sh after implementing enum recursion
Fix any clippy issues following warning rules
Run cargo nextest run to validate changes
Test Bug 1 Fix: Verify nested paths for Option<Vec2> in Sprite
Test Bug 2 Fix: Verify all signature examples in enum fields
Test Bug 3 Fix: Verify Option<Rect> shows inner structure
Test Bug 4 Fix: Verify TextureAtlas format with enum_variants
